{{Wired embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=PL-X31 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=08/27/2008 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=discontinued |type=Powerline Adapter |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=HomePlug AV |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth= }} '''200Mbps HomePlug AV Ethernet Adapter''' :[http://www.asus.com/ph/Networking/PLX31 Product Page] :[http://support.asus.com/knowledge.aspx?SLanguage=en&p=10&m=PL-X31/PL-X32 Support Page]
4PL-X32 is a kit containing two PL-X31 adapters. :Appears to be for non-US markets.
*[http://uk.asus.com/News/S1jtnIkQDyniRz20/ ''Press Release''] (dated August 27, 2008)
